title: Jesus-Myth eBooks (Carrier, Price, Doherty, etc.)
description:
Jesus Mythicists' eBook collection (Carrier, Price, Doherty, Loftus+)

Barber & Barber - When They Severed Earth from Sky

Derek Murphy - Jesus Potter Harry Christ

Earl Doherty - The End of an Illusion

Richard Carrier - Bart Ehrman and the Quest of the Historical Jesus of Nazareth

Richard Carrier - Not the Impossible Faith

Richard Carrier - Proving History

Richard Carrier - Why I Am Not a Christian
Richard Friedman - The Hidden Book in the Bible
Richard Friedman - Who Wrote the Bible
Richard Rubenstein - When Jesus Became God
Robert M. Price - Deconstructing Jesus
